input_text:
Job Title: Senior QA Engineer

Location: White Plains, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Overview

Job Purpose

As a member of the Value Added Product team, this is a position for a Senior QA resource to test, maintain, support, and enhance testing processes for products implemented by the development team.

Responsibilities

Implementation of test plans, test infrastructure, test automation and project plans.Project management - May lead or direct the work of others, changing priorities as needed.Responsible for keeping products in line as far as quality, functionality and usability.Directs quality assurance functions covering the full software life cycle.Works with product development team, technology team and customers to identify and assure quality of product.Conducts system and integration test and validation activities.Serves as Second Level Support for product line.Training Support and Operational teams.

Knowledge And Experience

Knowledge/experience: 5+ yrs Quality Assurance and software testingWork skills/ general skillsSQL experience required (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, etc.)Experience implementing software quality processes and proceduresWindows and very strong UNIX/Linux system level experience (3-4 yrs experience in a UNIX/Linux environment)Demonstrable Unix shell scripting skillsExperience with automated toolsTCP/IP knowledgeStrong problem solving, analysis skills neededCandidates must be self-directedCommunication skills, attention to detailPreferred Skills and Experience:

Programming experience with Python, Java or C/C++Market Data knowledge a plusQualifications/education: BS degree in Computer Science or information technology or relevant experience
Schedule

This role offers work from home flexibility of up to 2 days per week.

Base Salary Range for New York Candidates

The expected base salary for this role is between 115,000 - 149,000 USD. The base salary range does not include Intercontinental Exchangeâ€™s incentive compensation. While we provide this range as general guidance, at ICE we compensate employees based on the skillset and experience of the individual.

Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or ancestry, age, disability or veteran status, or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): None
